headline: Gold and Silver Open 2026 With Gains Following Huge Annual Surge
summary: “We expect a massive 13% of aggregate open interest in Comex silver markets will be sold over the coming two weeks, to result in a dramatic repricing lower,” Daniel Ghali, a senior commodity strategist at TD Securities, wrote in a note.  Precious metals posted a ferocious run higher last year, although there was significant volatility in late December as some investors booked profits and trading metrics pointed to overbought conditions.  Gold notched a series of records in 2025, aided by central-bank buying, easing Federal Reserve policy, and a weaker US dollar.
